name: Data_Blaster
description:
Synopsis:

In this game you play as a Data Miner who's goal is to collect as many data as
possible before being caught by malicious tracker. (The game is soundless by design, because I did not want to include extra files, feel free to buy the source code and import your own sounds.)

Origin:

Data Blast is A simple yet engaging python game, that I coded on my phone during lunch breaks,

Disclaimer:

This project uses the following library's; pygame, sys, os, math, random
